ai-atk-s0404a9:1_1: And in this way the laywomen Bojjhā ... Sir, Sirīmā ... Sutanā ... Manujā ... Uttarā ... Muttā ... Khemā ... Somā ... Rucī ... Cundī ... Bimbī ... Sumanā ... Mallikā ... Tissā ... Tissamātā ... Soṇā ... Uttarā Nanda’s mother ... Kāṇā ... Visākhā Migāra’s mother ... the laywomen ... the laywomen ... the laywomen ... the laywomen ... Suppiyā ... the laywomen ... the laywomen ... the laywomen ... the laywomen ...
ai-atk-s0404a9:2_0: Discussion of the proper conduct for the upper garments
ai-atk-s0404a9:3_0: The Book of the Eights is finished.
ai-atk-s0404a9:4_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-atk-s0404a9:5_0: if it is the upper limb.
